title: Tsumari Suki tte iitai n Dakedo
overview: A woman who hates lies, and a man who knows how to lie. Two people who have been connected to each other since childhood are falling in love!24-year-old Sejima Chitose quits her job as a teacher at an elementary school and gets a job at an entertainment agency as a talent manager. The celebrity she was assigned is the talented actor Fujishiro Sen, who was a bully as a child, who is on the verge of collapse. Chitose is struggling to re-educate Sen...based on the manga of the same name by Enjouji Maki.
